IAEX::ChangeStyleOnSelectedCellsCommand

Detailed Description

Changes style on selected cells.

Author:
Ingemar Axelsson and Anders Fernström
Date:
2005-10-28 (update)
This does not work on selected Cellgroups. This because I have not defined what will happen if I change style on a cellgroup. Probably all its children will get the same style.

2005-10-28, updated style_ from a QString object to a CellStyle object. Needed to do some major change of the class. /AF
